update de_stage_event set event = #{event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, targetId = #{targetid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, targetName = #{targetname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stageId = #{stageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isMust = #{ismust,jdbcType=INTEGER} where eventId = #{eventid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from de_stage_event where stageId <= #{stageid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by stageId
select count(stageId) from de_stage_event WHERE isMust =1 and stageid = #{stageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
